section.name: Selenium plugin
section.p: Selenium allows you to run your test in a real browser, like Firefox.
Today, we can't automatically start selenium-server before tests and stop it after. You should manually start it: java -jar where/is/selenium-server-xx.jar

section.name: HowTo manage dependencies with Maven 2
section.p:
Just add the following dependency to your pom:
... <dependencies> ... <dependency> <groupId>net.sourceforge.jwebunit</groupId> <artifactId>jwebunit-selenium-plugin</artifactId> <version>1.3-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency> ... </dependencies> ...
